data_maturity_score.evidence: IBM uses modern Azure stack (Databricks, DevOps, Blob) but no mention of advanced practices like data catalogs, lineage tracking, or quality monitoring frameworks

data_maturity_level.evidence: Modern tools and documented processes mentioned, but lacks advanced governance and quality frameworks typical of managed/optimizing levels

maturity_signals.evidence: Azure Databricks, Azure DevOps, and Azure Blob storage indicate cloud-native modern data stack adoption

scope_creep_score.evidence: Well-defined data engineering role focused on ETL, data processing, and Azure platforms with no mention of backend, frontend, or unrelated responsibilities

overtime_risk_score.evidence: IBM consulting role may involve client deadlines and project timelines, but no specific overtime or on-call mentions

role_clarity.evidence: Focused data engineering responsibilities with specific technical requirements and clear deliverables around data pipelines and processing

overall_red_flag_score.evidence: Low risk - well-defined role at established company (IBM) with clear technical scope and no major red flags

reporting_structure_clarity.evidence: No specific reporting structure, manager level, or team hierarchy mentioned in job description

team_growth_velocity.evidence: No team growth, expansion, or hiring velocity information provided

reporting_structure.evidence: No reporting structure information provided in job posting

cross_functional_embedded.evidence: Mentions partnering with scientists, engineers, consultants and database administrators in collaborative environment

growth_opportunities_score.evidence: No learning budgets, career paths, or growth opportunities mentioned; collaborative environment suggests some mentorship potential

tech_culture_score.evidence: Modern Azure tech stack and agile methodology mentioned, but lacks specific engineering practices, testing, or innovation culture details

tech_culture_signals.evidence: No open source, tech blogs, conferences, hackathons, or innovation time mentioned

ml_tools_expected.evidence: Mentions predictive models, statistical models, and machine learning techniques but no specific tools listed

hiring_urgency.evidence: No immediate start dates, urgency language, or time pressure mentions in job posting

company_stage_inferred.evidence: IBM is a large, established enterprise technology company with global operations

hiring_velocity.evidence: IBM typically has steady hiring patterns for consulting roles, no aggressive expansion signals

strength_details: Modern Azure data stack (Databricks, DevOps, Blob storage)
Established enterprise company (IBM) with stability and resources
Clear technical requirements and well-defined data engineering scope
Collaborative environment working with diverse technical teams
concern_details: No salary, benefits, or compensation information disclosed
No visa sponsorship mentioned - India-based position only
On-site role in Kochi with no remote work options
No career growth paths, learning budgets, or advancement opportunities mentioned
best_fit_details: Mid-level data engineers (4-6 years) with Azure and Python/PySpark experience
Engineers specializing in Azure Databricks and data lake architectures
Data professionals seeking stable enterprise environment with modern tech stack
probe_details: Ask about salary range, benefits, and total compensation package
Understand team structure, reporting lines, and collaboration model
Inquire about career progression and learning opportunities
Clarify work hours, project timelines, and client delivery expectations
leverage_details: Strong match for Azure Databricks + Python/PySpark combination is valuable
Experience with predictive modeling and ML integration adds differentiation
summary.overall_assessment: Solid data engineering opportunity at established enterprise company (IBM) with modern Azure tech stack. Well-defined role with clear technical requirements and collaborative environment. Main limitations are lack of compensation transparency, on-site location requirement in Kochi, and unclear career growth prospects.
